typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
DerivedColumn1 window(over(dummy),
	asc(movie, true),
	startRowOffset: -1L,
	endRowOffset: 0L,
	Rating2 = first(coalesce(Rating))) ~> Window1
source1 derive(dummy = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
Window1 derive(Rating = iif(isNull(Rating),Rating2,Rating)) ~> DerivedColumn2
